release_note: Bugfixes and improvements
A couple of bugs where removed and put into the void
Now you can set so the camera starts when the app starts. That feature came from a user so if you have anything you want me to add in the app just email me and I will hopefully add it
Bug fixes and improvements.
I have sent a couple of bugs to bug heaven
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements
Bugfixes and improvements As always if you have any feature you want me to add just contact me and I will do my best to add it.
Bugfixes and improvments
Bugfixes and improvements
Added bokeh feature so you can add so it looks like lens flare in your photos
Fixed a date issue that occurred during the New Year. Sorry for that
Bugfixes and improvments
Fixed an issue where you couldn t really see the film name in Dark mode
Added Dark Mode support
Some important bug fixes regarding the camera
Fixed some issues with the camera
Bug fixes
You can now choose to save as PNG or JPEG.
Tiny but important bugfixes

Thanks to Francis who emailed me and wanted a settings to temporarily turn off the tutorial screen I have now added that. I have said it before but I just love when you reach out to me about features you want and I can add them.
I always listen to you guys so now you can add a date stamp into your images. You can change the presentation in the settings.
I found a couple of bugs in the camera that I sent to bug heaven.
Fixed a couple of bugs that could make the dust layer to not be as visible as one want.
Fixed a couple of bugs with light leak. Thanks Andr√© for finding it and pointing it out to me

Bugfixes where the camera could act strange when using the grid. There were an issue when exporting image but is now fixed. Clarification: If you prior to this release has bought the old PRO you will NOT have to pay for any subscription. So you don t have to worry when updating. You will be able to see all tutorials that normally needs subscription

Biggest update ever!! I have added almost 20 tutorials on how to learn composition and make better images. I will update regularly with more tutorials so you can really learn how to improve your images. Since I will create lots of content and update regularly I cannot do it without adding subscription to the app. I know many users don t like it but there is no way I can create so much content without subscription. I hope you understand that : If you experienced a crash with version 3.0 I have fixed that one. Thanks all for emailing me with the information so I could act fast.
I removed a couple of nasty bugs that could appear when saving the image
Removal of a couple of tiny bugs : Once again thanks for contacting me with new feature requests. Soon you will be even happier what I will add...

Add dust scratch to your images to make them really look old You can now modify your original images when saving an image. So you can always revert the image later on. If you don t have that beautiful image you can use Pixabay at no cost will always be free All these features came from users so if you have anything you want in the app just email me and I will add it.
Fixed an issue where the app crashed if you changed folder and had albums within your camera folders. Thanks Richard Brown for telling me about this immediately.
Now you can select all your folders I can t blame me on a bug this time. It was my misstake... . Anyway now you know I m human and by contacting me I fix the issues you find : Thanks for emailing me
On request you can now change the shadow and highlight of an image. The vignette tool is also reduced to not make it so powerful. Thanks for your idea on how to improve I Love Film.
Fixed a couple of bugs that shouldn t be alive in 2019
Fixed a bug that made the image taking with depth information were reduced in size. Thanks a lot Giuseppe Capozzo for finding it
Some bug fixes and reduced the app size a lot
Fixed a bug that caused the app to crash when altering a film s iso in the camera.
Now you can favorite your films for faster usage Change the grain for any film Fixed a couple of bugs too

Now you can see how the original image looked by pressing the image. Fixed a couple of initial bugs. I hope you like this app and hopefully write an honest review. It really helps for the rest of the users to know what you think about it.
